resume: Vinod  a college drop-out and a good-for-nothing guy falls in love with Narmada  daughter of a local don Sakthivel . She lives in a hostel after learning that her dad is a criminal who now wants her to marry his partner Sardar’s  brother. So the two lovers elope to Mumbai and soon they are tracked and separated. Finally Vinod  along with his friends fight against all odds to win back Narmada.
